role.descr: item / entity taking place of other
item / entity being substituted by the other

example.name: autogen1
example.text: a consultant and former Algerian OPEC delegate

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the Communist Party no longer has automatic delegates in the U.S.S.R. 's Congress of Peoples Deputies
